text.text:
Heat = stadiums? Not for this one. You can feel the subtle breeze of air conditioning everywhere in the stadium even when youâ€™re at the seats. Lots of food choices. Proper toilets. Fantastic view. Top notch experience. Kudos.

Food available during HSBC 7â€™s 2025;
Hotdogs
Japanese tako & yakitori
Fish & chips
Burgers
Beers
Noodles
Etc

Most were below SGD15

text.text:
An impressive and modern venue, perfect for hosting major events like sports matches, concerts, and national celebrations. The stadium is spacious, well-designed, and features a retractable roof and a cooling system, making it comfortable even during large crowds.

Getting there is very convenient with Stadium MRT station located nearby. The surroundings, including Kallang Wave Mall, add to the convenience with plenty of dining and shopping options.

The atmosphere inside the stadium is energetic and lively, making events here very enjoyable. However, food options inside can be quite limited and pricey, and thereâ€™s a strict no re-entry policy that some may find inconvenient.

Overall, it's a fantastic venue for a big event, with great accessibility and a vibrant environment.

text.text:
Just went to National Stadium for Seventeen Right Here concert. The experience is awesome!
I like it here, the place is huge huge. Just need more restroom I guess ðŸ« 
With the number of stadium capacity, I thought you need more restroom.
The chair also comfortable. When people stands on the tribune sides and jump, itâ€™s a bit bouncy. Idk its a good thing or no? I mean in a safety perspective. Is it should be that bouncy to prevent accident if people move too much on the tribune?
Well, other than that I was enjoying my time there.

text.text:
Went to JJ concert

Empty bottles r allowed
Handheld fan is allow
Don't bring any bags if u wanna use the express lane.

Not hot as there's cool air blowing out from the bottom but bring a handheld fan to play safe.

text.text: My first concert with Mayday here. Stadium is quite big and thanks for indoor stadium. Concert will not affected during the heavy rain. Empty drinking bottle can bring in while only 3 drinking station inside the stadium. One outside the gate while 2 after enter the gate. However, the overall atmosphere, lighting and the band is great enough. I am have a good memory here with Mayday.
